answer:
In BC, adults are eligible to receive one or two doses of the measles, mumps rubella vaccine depending on the year you were born. Go here to see other vaccines you may need as an adult. Publicly funded (free) vaccines from your local health unit. Find a location  here to make an appointment. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, adults are eligible to receive one or two doses of the measles, mumps rubella vaccine depending on the year you were born.

Go here to see other vaccines you may need as an adult.
Publicly funded (free) vaccines from your local health unit.

## Find a location  here to make an appointment.

Immunization Nurse
question: where can i get the measles booster? I already took the measles vaccination when I was young, but could not find the records, so I just want to take the measles booster to make sure. This is for a volunteer work at a hospital
